column2: "I feel uneasy. Why don't the Dragonkin destroy buildings even after being corrupted?"
"Hmm, it's not just the Dragonkin. The corrupted hostiles only target ARKS..."
"If I can complete more reports, I might be able to see some kind of answer."
"So, I must ask this of you. These are always ludicrous requests, but... You're the only one I can rely on."
